mdRecord.dcterms:title: Maybe I Can String Him Along With This
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leasure, Al
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Willie, I think our entry has a little too much pedigree behind him!""Mr. Holt, as a veteran I know the value of honest leadership! So my buddies want you to handle our interests!""Maybe I can string him along with this!"(Field trial. Entries. Rush Holt & progress. Marland & co. "promises deluxe".)(Very stale bait!)(Rock of Gibralter)(Promises)(3 1/2 yrs. of howling)
The cartoon features William C. Marland, the Democratic opponent to Rush Holt in the 1952 W.V. gubernatorial election.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
Holt, Rush Dew, 1905-1955
Politics and government
West Virginia
